data.title: The Last Ghost Hunters (DVD)(2021)
data.meta_description: Shop The Last Ghost Hunters (DVD)(2021) at Target. Choose from Same Day Delivery, Drive Up or Order Pickup. Free standard shipping with $35 orders.
data.text: A team of paranormal investigators are hired to explore an abandoned country home that has been linked to several recent missing persons cases. They soon discover that the activity in the old house is much stronger than they anticipated as they are drawn deeper into the lair of an ancient demonic evil.
